amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Transportation; construction contracts authorized.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Transportation shall be authorized to enter into contracts for the construction of viaducts or subways, in accordance with plans and specifications approved under section 18-601, immediately upon the approval by the voters of the issuance of bonds under section 18-610.
